website_summaries.verdict: A mini camera at a decent price that has a lot of nice features for such a small package.
pros: Can be worn as a body camera and has a sturdy clip to keep it in place
produces high definition video with clear picture quality
Works fairly well in low-light situations
cons: Motion sensor is quite sensitive, possibly resulting in unnecessary recording

customer_reviews.title: Practical for small p
customer_reviews.text: I never thought of buying a hidden camera before but I decided to try this out as a secondary security camera to my small business. Lately I have experienced a rush hour and sadly I am understaffed so I placed one in my shop to monitor possible theft or business sales abuse. I can only have so many obvious security cameras in certain areas so this one worked well in a small corner. Setting it up was easy and the quality of the recordings were good. No one has noticed or questioned me about it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Lam

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great for very small camera ! Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Really been impressed with this camera, particularly for its small size. Tried 4 or 5 others but they didn't measure up, either difficult to use, had to link to phone, etc. This camera is simple to use...put the SD card in, choose motion detection, choose HD and start the camera. I use it walking around does just great, the video clarity is surprisingly good ! Had some trouble with initial order, but Fuvision was very helpful and sent me a replacement. I would recommend this camera if you are looking for something small, light, easy to use! I only hope they offer a 64 GB or larger SD card capacity in the future, right now only 32 GB...
customer_reviews.author: PJK1954

customer_reviews.title: High quality video
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I love this mini camera because the quality of video is way over my imagine! Easy set up, all I need to do is charge it and use it. After full charge, I turn the camera on and it can record 85 mins (with 32GB SD). It comes with clip and mount holder but I just use 3M double side tape to stick on the wall. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jine-Hwa,Hsieh

customer_reviews.title: Versatile cam
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gadget that does its job! Ideal feature was the MD (motion detection) that for me, is a battery & memory saver.. you will not waste space on unnecessary footage.A definite must have to catch some mischief!
customer_reviews.author: liane

customer_reviews.title: Great for Discrete Security
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a security camera that could be used discretely for security purposes and this item fit the bill. The various mounts, size of the camera, and the USB with the micro SD input were all positive. The addition of the option for Recording or Motion Detected recording was a bonus. I hope to update this review later.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Wrong usb cable included
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to receive the camera and get it charged to check it out. Was super udisappointed to find that the usb cable included has the wrong connection to work with the camera. Now have to search to find one to be able to charge it...
customer_reviews.author: N Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Decent battery life, tiny and robust
customer_reviews.text: Its a tiny camera so you can technically carry it with you anywhere and make use of it as per you need. Battery lasts a decent time for a camera that size and it supports 128gb of storage which is great. It comes with 3 attachments too. I have used one to permanently mount it in the wall
customer_reviews.author: David Chaudhary

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I got in an accident and the other driver was verbally abusing while denying the fact that he hit my car. I thought a small cameras would be a good idea just in case anything gets violent. So I bought this product. I tested and it's working fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sent From Earth

customer_reviews.title: Seriously don't waste your time or especially your money.
customer_reviews.text: These motion detector cameras don't work wort anything, they were able to record once and haven't recorded since. I've charged and re-charged them continuously and have recorded nothing beyond my first recording since. Plus, you have t go to their website to download the drivers to see what you recorded, which defeats the whole point of just being able to use the memory card adapter on my laptop. So if you read this, save yourself the time, money and aggravation of owning this product. P.S. I normally don't write customer reviews, but this had to be said. Thanks - Richard
customer_reviews.author: Richard N. Brock

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your antivirus software is up to date
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I plugged the camera into my computer via the USB so that I could set the date and time, I got a warning from my antivirus software that said "One of your programs is behaving strangely, which could be a sign of malware." It's possible it was a coincidence or a false alarm, but it wasn't worth the risk to me. I also kept getting an error message saying the drive wasn't working correctly and needed to be scanned and repaired. I'm returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Decent, not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, happy with purchase. Camera is small compared to many others. Price was great. Downside- even with class 10 card, if recording on FHD, picture will freeze often while recording (audio is never disturbed). Issue is resolved when using HD (720 p presumably). Only other issue is there is no light to show charging status. Not when plugged in, not when fully charged. And no indicator anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Hieb

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: It never worked. It also came without the manual in the box. I wrote the seller and the seller was nice enough and send me a pdf of the manual and gave me some suggestions on how to get the camera working. Unfortunately nothing worked. I was able to find 1 video on YouTube detailing how to use it. I was doing the same as in the video and manual so I think this was faulty or just a poor quality product.
customer_reviews.author: JayCee

customer_reviews.title: Mini spy camera
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to install, it's small, but it fits right into an area.I could see everything, and when we left the baby with the babysitter, it was good to keep the baby safe, and I heard a noise downstairs, and I didn't have to stand up to see it, and you could see everything in the dark.Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Wright

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: it stopped working after two days and it only records in 10 min intervals on REC for 40 min then it dies. I rebooted and it worked for 5 min then died again and yes it was fully charged. Bad product, but for the price i cant really expect it to be that great. It cant keep the basic functions that you would expect it to based on what it describes. MD does not work at all. I was thoroughly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Gs.

customer_reviews.title: So far, very nice, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product highly recommend I'm going to do a unboxing video this week. Along with a aerial video on my drone with this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald F.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely usable
customer_reviews.text: Can record everything it sees and for the amount of time as it says. Picture seems clear, sometimes it looks as if your recording a old video, but that depends on movement. Otherwise satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Kiara Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Loving it so far
customer_reviews.text: I am loving it so far. It has so many accessories (please check the picture). It is awesome. Quality is good and I am glad. It is really small and can be mounted omg super cool. They legit thought things through for it. I would recommend it. If this review helped, please like. Thank you! : )
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Trying to Be Helpful

customer_reviews.title: Great review camera, recommended!
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this mini camera. After I bought it, it was very clear to use, especially convenient for the device. I installed it in the office so that I can safely go home from work. After using it for a few days, it feels great. It ’s me. The product I have always wanted before, after using it myself, I recommend it to those who need it, and it is really great! !! !! !!
customer_reviews.author: Hallie Kunze

customer_reviews.title: For the video quality, I would say yes!
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect such a level of quality for the price. I am really impressed with the video quality because it is clear and fluid. Plus, I am very happy with the equipment and after-sales service very good. The mini camera is very good in video recording mode that can shoot very clear video.
customer_reviews.author: James Fuller

customer_reviews.title: this is not an outdoor camera.
customer_reviews.text: i have used this as a body camera every time i walk my dog and boy the video was so bright even in a cloudy day that i thought i was standing in front of a bright light. indoors works fine.
customer_reviews.author: leMonte

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my 3rd camera they work for a while then don’t. The 3rd one I have doesn’t work at all. I’m so disappointed. The first one worked for 5 weeks. It had nice video and then would not record only dark images. Second one only lasted a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Instructions missing most important info
customer_reviews.text: 7 pages of instructions and NOTHING about what file format to use and/or if the SD card can be formatted in the cameras or has to be formatted externally - unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: traderggl

customer_reviews.title: Got what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I have been testing this for a couple of days, it took me a little to get the hang of it but it works great, the quality of the video is good, you do have to buy a separate mini memory card up to 62G for it to work, I got a 32g and it works fine
customer_reviews.author: Valeria ramos

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Recordings, Extremely Short Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: All in all there is not much I do like about this camera to be honest. The video quality is the only decent feature when it works. The camera records with little or no motion at all which contributes to the short battery life. What they don’t tell you is the battery dies regardless of whether or not the camera is recording. I believe I only got around 2 recordings off of one full charge. Do not waste your time or money, I can’t emphasize this enough. This is a classic example of you get what you pay for, I wouldn’t recommend this camera if it was free. It’s cheap, shotty, and most likely Chinese made.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: I like this!
customer_reviews.text: This will require some playing around with to familiarize yourself with the controls of operation since there are only two buttons so keep the instruction card but this camera it’s fairly small, offers a clip and a magnetic holder (which is nice). Make sure you format your micro sd card properly. For a funny time attach clip to your pet’s collar and see life from their perspective. Good picture quality. Includes a micro sd card reader too, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P

customer_reviews.title: Tiny camera!
customer_reviews.text: this camera is thin and small, although not as small as pictured on the main image. It is small enough to hide and not have it being noticed. The quality on it is great, and the battery life is so so, but what to expect from something this small. You can connect it to a portable battery and hide it in a discrete location for longer hours. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony dddd

customer_reviews.title: very clear
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so small, which is out of my expectation. This hidden camera does need a micro sd memory card to work which it does not come with. It does come with a micro sd to USB for plugging into your computer to get videos off. It even comes with a clip to wear it. I get good video quality out of it and it captured video in my dark house.
customer_reviews.author: bRian Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Buy Something Else!
customer_reviews.text: For those of you that are old enough. Do you remember the bad video quality and how the video would just start and stop during play back on those computer web cams that came out about 20 years ago? Well if you do and miss that buy yourself one of these mini cams. Yes, there's a possibility i purchased one with issues's but i think i'll search for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Not at all happy with this.
customer_reviews.text: I did not reach out to the seller. I just brushed this off as something I fell for. The small piece that attaches it to the wall broke when I tried to get the camera mounted. That was day one. It is not easy to use and does not take very good videos. It sits on my desk and does nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - $30 in this case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for use in a model rocket. It's nicely compact and self-contained, but the video quality is terrible. The "full HD" is very grainy and movement is jerky. It looks like it's simply blown-up from lower resolution. Also, the audio recording is very faint. There needs to be a way of increasing the microphone gain.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: nice!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this camera as a surveillance purpose. Really small and not easy to notice even I just leave it on top of the fireplace. Easy to set up. The pictures quality are great. The night vision was very clear as well even though I don't use it that often because it is there for monitoring my teenage boys after school. They like to bring different friends home to play games when both me and my husband are not home.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: 12 months warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Very small size recording camera comes with brochure. Easy to set it up. Also comes with card reader, charger and three different camera’s holders. Easy to hide.
customer_reviews.author: Valeriya

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my sister to monitor her teenage son
customer_reviews.text: My sister was having trouble with her teenage son sneaking around and having no respect for the rules of the house, so I got her this mini spy camera so she can see if he is abiding by the rules. As of right now he is, but she will soon be going on a trip, and this will help her be able to keep an eye on him and make sure he abides by the rules. This hidden camera is very nice with a great picture!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Fisketjon

customer_reviews.title: Small camera
customer_reviews.text: Good camera as describe. Small and light. Would be better if it includes SD card. Had to make another purchase after realized it didn't include one after receiving.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I am very surprised. It's a fast and good camera. However, do not expect such a result by this small and not expensive camera. The quality of shooting is excellent. it displays the date and time. it is very convenient. Records with sound. Very small, you can easily hide. It is a good spy cam and motion.
customer_reviews.author: kyle leung

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I got this thinking it would help me in the garage where I have been missing some items lately... it doesn't work! I've tried everything I know and it just doesn't work - you are left on your own too - no instructions came with it! Not what I was hoping for at all.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S

customer_reviews.title: Practically and versatility.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for such a suitable camera for a long time as it is very good for hidden camera and traveling. I hidden it now because we were robbed for $2000 great camera. I'm very glad that I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Nadiya Kolisnichenko

customer_reviews.title: strong signal
customer_reviews.text: After a few days of use, the remote control did not drop the line, the signal was strong, and the image was very clear. To be honest, it is worth starting. It is really stable and will not fall. The operation is relatively simple and easy to understand. The seller is very enthusiastic and his family specializes in after-sales technology and teaches me how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Broesamle

customer_reviews.title: I use it as a nanny cam or pet cam
customer_reviews.text: Wow,what an awesome and fun product!wouId say this spy camera is smaII enough that you can cIip it and hide it inside a pocket or behind a IapeI but takes good quaIity images. And this smaII smart camera is great for the chiIdren for spy games as weII as for aduIts who can use it as a nanny cam or pet cam.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these units to use and so far both work extremely well for my purpose. I had a bit of trouble figuring out how to remove the time stamp. I emailed tech support and received an extremely helpful response in less then 24 hrs. *Must change date and time before typing "N" to disable the timestamp. *Directions do not state that unit starts recording on power up in record mode.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Placed this in the panel of the door works great and do not have problems with battery life
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to get to record.
customer_reviews.text: Never know if its recording, can't get the files on computer for any length of time...
customer_reviews.author: Dale I. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: I got it. I love it
customer_reviews.text: Very useful, worth having.The picture is very clear and the function is very powerful.Very easy to use, face recognition, tracking, sound tracking.It's very human.Super practical, fast delivery logistics.
customer_reviews.author: Boyd Rabello

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT MINI CAM!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding little camera! I am a true skeptic but this little gem completely stunned me! Video is clear and concise, easy to install, truly an amazing little cam. Customer support is fantastic, quick to respond to any and all questions. Absolutely thrilled I took the chance and ordered this. If you are looking for a small, discreet camera that works extremely well, buy this one! You won't be sorry!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: cindym

customer_reviews.title: Verified Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Neighborhood where our mail and bikes have been stolen from our gated building. This Cam was perfect descreate see during day and night who come in/out of our building. I've reported 2 people and now we feel better in our Building. I would recomend this cam, so far its been working great for me and I leaver it on 24/7 for 1 week now. Good Luck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was more obvious when recording
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Picture quality is solid and better than expected. Only problem I have is it’s hard to know when it’s recording and to check on it later to see if it’s still recording there is no way to know
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gutkowski

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Little spy cam!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little camera. Long battery life. Night visions works great. Easily accessible from my phone anywhere. The app is really useful, I can log into the camera at any time and take pictures or videos. Perfect for when you want to keep an eye on your place. Must have for apartment living.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Zdon

customer_reviews.title: Can be used for different purposes
customer_reviews.text: Really cool camera! It is small enough and can be easily hidden. I can adhere it anywhere I want. Also good for the car records incase of an accident. I always wanted to have one of those!
customer_reviews.author: Irina Ievleva

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work as I anticipated. Was not as easily concealed as I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price wise...
customer_reviews.text: Great product for price, small amount of battery life time big drawback. I am satisfied with this purchase👍👍

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and low price
customer_reviews.text: I think the device is very good and the application is easy to use, but most importantly, it is easy to install. However, it does not provide real-time information on the surveillance area, but provides a photo frame taken by camara.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Lamarche

customer_reviews.title: But it's worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It works like I wanted to for my dog and for my neighbors

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: The hidden camera is really awesome, so different, the mini camera lens can be covert with mirror , even if it is placed directly on the top of the table, making people totally unaware that this is a mini surveillance camera. Really secret surveillance artifact oh, highly recommended!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful and satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The product is very powerful. In the past, things were often stolen. Now with this product, the thief is caught and very powerful

customer_reviews.text: Not too bad for the price pic is not 1080 try 720 at best but it works once you figure it out

customer_reviews.text: Very nice picture for a small device. It has some nice accessories.

They like to bring different friends home to play games when both me and my husband are not home.

customer_reviews.title: Cool but not cool
customer_reviews.text: So I got this thinking cool it is compact it will work well yeah it works but dont ket the description fool you with a full charge only lasts about 2 hours and that's with just motion detection and that's also not much going on to drain the battery it will take a few vids but then it's dead not good to have to keep charging yull miss anything you are trying to catch

customer_reviews.title: Never miss it

customer_reviews.title: Great Mini Camera!
customer_reviews.text: It was an easy setup and works as it should. The only thing I should note is that it needs to stay relatively close to the router. A solution to this would be a wifi extender or of course using near the existing wireless router. I am just using it in the office so it worked out for me. I would recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me

The motion sensor is great because he doesn’t bark or whine for us, and there’s no accidents because we can see when he’s up and we’re able to let him out. So it’s also helping with crate training.

Overall it's a great "toy" for me to play around and I'm able to clip it on my dog's collar so I can see things from his point of view!

customer_reviews.text: I just got it installed today. I always want a small camera to monitor my dog during the day. The configuration process didn't take too long. The picture came out fine on my phone.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install

product_meta.title: Mini Spy Camera,FUVISION Micro Camera with Motion Detect,1080P Full HD Hidden Camera with 1.5 Hours Battery Life,Hidden Security Camera with Loop Recording Perfect for Home and Office
feature_bullets: 📷You can choose to record in Full 1080P HD resolution or a lower 720P HD resolution, both at a frame rate of 30 frames per second. The 1/3" CMOS 2.0 megapixels image sensor ensures that you get crisp and clear video with time/date stamp

👍This pocket sized camera(Dimension:0.87x0.63x1.62inch,0.56oz)can record video and also motion detection. It records up to 90 minutes of video in full 1080P resolution and up to 100 minutes when using 720p resolution. all video are stored into max 64GB micro SD card, support file overwrite.(SD Not Included)

📷Besides continuous recording,the camera also has motion detection mode, which largely saves the memory space and extends the recording time. You don't worry to miss important moments any more.Also offered is a file overwrite feature, which replaces old recordings with new ones once micro SD card gets exhausted.

✅It comes with a front and a rear clip that can attach to a pocket for convenient hands-free recording.and also camera mount bracket for installing on the wall with AC power plug in,which allows it to operate 24/7 without any battery life concerns.This also keeps it covert, perfect for when you need to capture surveillance video.
👍What's included: Mini Camera Recorder, Front Clip, Rear Clip,Camera Mount Bracket, Screws, Instruction Manual, Warranty Card, Card Reader, Reset Pin, USB Cable
